title: My Pet Dog
text: I have a pet dog. His name is Max. He is 3 years old. Max is a golden retriever. He has soft brown fur and big brown eyes. Max is very friendly and playful. He likes to run and catch balls. Every morning, I walk Max in the park. He loves to meet other dogs. Max eats dog food twice a day. At night, he sleeps in his bed next to mine. Max is my best friend. I love him very much!
